resultsDriving: The recommended route is __summary__. The actual duration is __duration_in_traffic__. The normal duration is __duration__. The distance is __distance__.
resultsTransit: The actual duration via transit is __duration__. You should depart at __departure_time__. The route exists of __steps__ steps.
resultsBicycling: The cycling route via __summary__ will take approximately __duration__. The distance is __distance__.
resultsWalking: The walking route via __summary__ will take approximately __duration__. The distance is __distance__.
errorParsing: An error has occured while retrieving the directions. The error is __status__.
errorDownloading: An error has occured while downloading the directions.
noApiKey: No API key has been configured in the settings of the application.
